title: League of Legends Team with Gaming House open tryout
body: The requirements will be: Minimum elo in soloQ Master, excellent knowledge of English, Competitive experience, availability 4 hours a day exept Saturdays and holidays. Our team believes in their players and their potential, for this he decided to invest heavily in the project, he can guarantee a fixed salary, the opportunity to use the Gaming House and a specialized technical staff, paid travels and if our players needs hardware we will provide it. Anyone who comply the requirements and wants to participate in the selections must complete the document below. Entries will be available from 12/09 to 08/10, but tryouts will be announced later.
